WHO WE ARE:

The Association of Enterprises of Forest and Landscape in Andalusia (AAEF) is an employers' organization, created in 1989 to strengthen the forest sector in Andalusia. After more than twenty five years of active experience, AAEF is now classified as a benchmark organization at regional and national level, which associates the largest companies in the forestry sector.


MAIN ACTIVITY PILLARS OF AAEF:
1. Promoting professionalization of the forestry sector from the companies affiliated through training, innovation, technological development and implementation of all quality standards, environmental health and safety.
2. Represent the interests of the forestry sector politics, regional, national and European sustainable development and social forestry.
3. Participate in regional, national and European cooperation in the field of environmental protection.
4. Dissemination of information on forestry and landscaping.

OUR COMPANIES:

AAEF includes 332 private Andalusian forestal companies, specializing in the planning, management, implementation and maintenance of the environment. The activities of these companies focus on:

• Afforestation
• Forest and preventive treatments
• Forest roads and firewall
• The exploitation of forest resources
• Hydrological Reconstruction of the forest
• Infrastructure in the environment
• Dams, ponds, canals
• Reconstruction of landscape and garden
• Treatment to correct environmental influences
• Recovery of ecosystems, etc


In these projects, the use of machinery and equipment, high technology, human resources possess the technical skills, all together permit to perform specific tasks of forestry works. All our companies have one thing in common: to provide effective solutions for the protection and conservation of our natural heritage. The experience and the potential of our members are confirmed by the certificates of quality and environmental management in the field of forestry and landscaping - ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 and OHSAS 18001 for health and safety in enterprises.
